price: 21 Craignant vos représailles, j’ai pris la fuite. Mon Seigneur m’a alors fait don de la sagesse et m’a choisi pour être l’un de Ses Messagers.
arabic: فَفَرَرۡتُ مِنكُمۡ لَمَّا خِفۡتُكُمۡ فَوَهَبَ لِي رَبِّي حُكۡمٗا وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fafarartu minkum lammā khif'tukum fawahaba lī rabbī ḥuk'man wajaʿalanī mina al-mur'salīna
